programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby. V siedmej sérii sa divákom predstaví úplne nová a nemenej skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predvedú obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplní populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich budú tvoriť víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci uvidia aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár a po prvýkrát sa v porote predstavia hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Šou bude opäť pod moderátorskou taktovkou Martina Nikodýma.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Prízvuk. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Júlii sa zdá čudné, že hoci má otec Sekera výrazný ruský prízvuk, nikto v rodine to nekomentuje a všetky narážky na to, že mu je zle rozumieť, sú tabu. Jano a ostatní Júliu varujú, no ona si nedá povedať a rozhodne sa zistiť, ako k prízvuku prišiel. Sekera si v rámci pátrania po svojom pôvode vyrobí doma malé Rusko a snaží sa vrátiť ku koreňom. V domácnosti Sekerovcov zavládne zima, chlad a hlad.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Veľká noc. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Júlia sa nevie dočkať prvej Veľkej noci, ktorú strávi na vidieku. Jej liberálna mama slávila všetky sviatky vlastnými multikultúrnymi rituálmi, takže Júlia sa vyslovene vyžíva vo všetkom tradičnom - vrátane krutých zvykov, akými sú šibačka a oblievačka. Je prekvapená, že mama Sekerová a Betka jej radosť nezdieľajú. Varujú ju pred rým, čo zažije, ale Júlia si nedá povedať. Jej emancipovanú dušu čaká ťažká skúška.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Romantika. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Júlia sa vrátila zo stretávky zo strednej školy nešťastná. Uvedomila si, že sa po čase strávenom v Timravanoch a stereotypnom manželskom živote zmenila na domácu puťku. Rozhodne sa zapracovať na tom, aby bola pre Jana opäť príťažlivá. Jano pochopiteľne žiadnu zmenu nepostrehol a nerozumie tomu, prečo sa zrazu Júlia tak veľmi snaží a vyrába romantické prekvapenia. Pravá pohroma začne až vtedy, keď sa do Júliinho plánu zamiešajú rodičia a všetko ešte viac zhoršia.

programme.title: Sekerovci
programme.sub-title: Sexuálna výchova. Komediálny seriál SR (2012).
programme.desc: Betka sa chystá na školský výlet. Júlia ju podporuje v tom, aby si ho užila so všetkým, čo k tomu patrí. Mama Sekerová je však plná obáv. Betka podľa nej neprešla dostatočnou sexuálnou výchovou a je nevyhnutné, aby ju poučila o tom, ako to v živote chodí. Betka nad maminými pokusmi vysvetliť jej všetko, čo už dávno vie, prevracia oči. Je nahnevaná, že jej rodičia neveria. Júlia sa aktívne zapojí a urobí Betke osvetu po svojom.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V ďalšej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ populárnu investigatívnu reportérku Kristínu Kövešovú. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.title: Afrika 2007 - Slnko a tiene Afriky
programme.sub-title: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu
programme.desc: Cestovateľský príbeh Henricha Krejču a Matúša Sirotu

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Dovolenka: Je tu čas dovoleniek a všetci vyrážajú za oddychom. Lenže Lászlovo auto sa pokazí. Presvedčia Františka a Zuzanu, aby ich odviezli cestou do Chorvátska na Balaton? Zmestia sa všetci do jedného auta, keď Marta nečakane pristane v Budapešti a cestou stretnú aj stopujúcu Andrejku? A kto postráži Františkov byt a Andrejkinho králika?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Dozvuky Balatonu: Kvôli nešťastnej dovolenke je vzťah susedov v kríze. László a František sa nerozprávajú. Marta už mesiac odkladá oslavu svojich menín, aby ich oslávili spoločne. Dá im ultimátum, ak sa neudobria prestane sa s nimi rozprávať aj ona. Dokážu Susedia prekonať svoje rozpory? Nájde sa ukradnuté Františkovo auto?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Tak kto je teda otec?!: Milka sa vrátila domov. František musí spávať na gauči v obývačke. Zuzana je rozhodnutá všetko usporiadať ako sa patrí. Treba nájsť otca očakávaného dieťaťa. Lenže Milka odmieta, a vie že jej chvíľková slabosť bola chybou a ešte väčšou by bol sobáš s Marekom, keď sa jej vôbec nepáči.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Agent provokatér: Zuzana ďalej spriada plány ako dať dokopy Milku s Marekom. László potrebuje riešiť partnerskú krízu, myslí si, že sa Ildikó nepáči taký aký je. Na lesnej správe je podozrenie z úplatkárstva a chlapi musia pomáhať usvedčiť páchateľa. Podarí sa im zasa nepopliesť všetky problémy a úspešne obstáť v ďalšej skúške ich vzťahu?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Klebety. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Jedného rána sa Ďuro zobudí doma po opici s boľavým zadkom a nič si nepamätá. Do klebiet sa zakrátko dostane Erika.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Cudzoložníci. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Keď si Ďuro a Chlpáči popletú adresy a každý sa zobudí v inej posteli, ženy sa rozhodnú, že im dajú ultimátum.

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Vitaj doma, kičibaba: Ildikó sa vracia z pôrodnice, ale je sklamaná, Lászlo nepripravil privítacie prekvapenie. Zuzanu nový investor vyšachoval a s pomocou tichého spoločníka prevzal kontrolu nad jej biznisom. Už nebude robiť vlogy, nahradí ju mladá herečka. František má tiež depresiu, reštaurácia vykazuje len dlhy. Lászlo sa snaží nedať si pokaziť náladu rozladenou Ildikó, ani faktom, že sám presne nevie, ako sa vlastne bude celým menom volať jeho syn. Milka hľadá dobrého právnika - otec jej dieťaťa čaká v Nórsku dvojičky s eskimáčkou. Ako vyriešia František a Lászlo krachujúcu reštauráciu? Kto je tichý spoločník Zuzaninho biznisu a naozaj chce ukradnúť jej “Pre mamičky od Zuzičky”? Podarí sa Lászlovi uspokojiť popôrodný stres Ildikó?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Stará láska nehrdzavie: Zuzane sa nepáči, akú úlohu jej pridelili v teleshopingu. František má migrénu, lebo Ágoston v noci nespí a má hlas ako cirkulárka. Lászlo to tiež nezvláda a zaspáva kdekoľvek, aj uprostred vety. Milka s Evanom nemá kde bývať, Marekove “mamy” ju vyhodili z bytu. Aj Gergely sa opäť vracia domov. Lászlo s Františkom sa rozhodnú dať Milku s Gergelym dohromady. Live teleshopingové vysielanie sa vymkne spod kontroly, keď ho narušia poštár, s mamou chce počas vysielania rozprávať Milka a nakoniec aj Marta Sladká. Podarí sa napriek vymeneným darčekom dostať Milku a Gergelyho na spoločné rande? Vyrieši Lászlo spánkový deficit? Ukončí Zuzana spoluprácu s teleshopom?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Ágostonove „krštiny“: Františkova mama sa prišla sťažovať na Zuzaninu mamu - nedá sa to s ňou vydržať a hrozí fyzické násilie. František s Lászlom sa nevzdávajú a napriek nezáujmu Milky a Gergelyho im chcú kúpiť spoločne byt. Ildikó ani Zuzane sa to nepáči. Ildikó je sústredená na krštiny Ágostona - Františka. Ale ak nie je všetko podľa nej, vyhráža sa ich zrušením. Zuzana s Andrejkou v teleshopingu propagujú “Vibrotic muscle” a pridá sa aj Zuzanina mama, ktorá sa príde sťažovať na tú Františkovu. Ako dopadnú krštiny, keď psychicky rozhodená Zuzana má na starosti zohnať sviečku aj košieľku? Podarí sa susedom uzmieriť po vzájomných výčitkách? Aký je vlastne vzťah Zuzaninej a Františkovej mamy? A prečo odrazu Františkovi záleží na Lászlovej životospráve?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Vianoce: Zuzana chce konečne trochu pokoja, Vianoce budú s Františkom oslavovať len v úzkom kruhu rodiny a on to musí oznámiť Lászlovi. Milka dostala od "debilových" mamičiek ako odškodné vianočný zájazd do Thajska. Ak chce František osláviť Štedrý večer so svojím vnukom, musia si Vianoce urobiť hneď. Ani Komáromovci nebudú na Štedrý večer doma. Ildikó dostala od kolegov welness pobyt. Lászlo napriek tomu hrá urazeného, že Fero nezabojoval so Zuzanou, aby mohli byť na Vianoce spolu. František má preto veľké výčitky, ale všetko sa prezradí a nakoniec sa po roztržke kamaráti opäť zmieria. Lászlo dokonca pomôže Františkovi pripraviť naozajstnú vianočnú oslavu so stromčekom aj s kaprom. Podarí sa Lászlovi s Ildikó odcestovať na wellness pobyt? Koľko ľudí sa nakoniec zúčastní na Františkových predčasných Vianociach, ktoré boli plánované pre najužšiu rodinu?

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Ingrid žije dlhé roky v Rakúsku. S manželom vychovali jej dvoch synov a prišiel čas, aby si začali užívať jeden druhého. Ingrid má však brata Attilu, ktorý je mentálne postihnutý. Celý život mu pomáha a chráni ho, aby ho niekto nevyužíval. Pred niekoľkými mesiacmi mu doslova zachránila život a odvtedy je u nej v Rakúsku. Je to však iba dočasné riešenie a Ingrid pracuje na tom, aby sa Attila dostal na miesto, kde by dostal odbornú starostlivosť a kde by bol v bezpečí. Úrady jej však hádžu iba polená pod nohy.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Teroristi: Františka vyznamenala Nadácia na ochranu prírody. Slávnostné odovzdávanie je len na pozvánky a František ide samozrejme so Zuzanou. Milka je členka Nadácie, Gergej bude súčasťou kultúrneho programu a Marta má pozvánky od ľudí, ktorým sa na akciu ísť nechce. László je veľmi urazený, lenže Ildikó si už kúpila nové šaty a nemieni sa vzdať. Andrejka má možnosť ísť spievať pápežovi, ale potrebuje odporúčanie dvoch patrónov, za ktorých si vyberie Lászlóa a Martu. Podarí sa Ildikó a Lászlóovi preniknúť do sály bez pozvánok v prevleku za hudobníkov alebo čašníkov kateringovej spoločnosti? Podarí sa Marte presvedčiť Jozefa, aby sa ako bezdomovec zúčastnil nóbl akcie? Vyberú Andrejku do zboru kresťanskej mládeže? Ako dopadne odovzdávanie ocenení, keď akciu narušia teroristi usilujúci sa o život ministra životného prostredia? A čo skrývali atentátnici v kateringovom servírovacom stolíku?

programme.title: Kuchyňa II
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2019).
programme.desc: Veronika so Zdeňkom jeden pred druhým predstierajú, že chodia pravidelne behať. Obaja sa pritom skoro dokaličia. Anička chce pomáhať ľuďom bez domova – keď si jedného nasťahuje do bytu, Michal s Jankom majú čo robiť, aby jej to vyhovorili.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Dievča: Marta a Róza sú dôchodkyne, ktoré žijú v obyčajnej bytovke. Nemajú sa veľmi čím zaoberať, preto pravidelne komentujú udalosti v okolí. Najnovšou témou sa stáva pre nich rozvedený Tomáš, ktorý prechádza ťažkým obdobím. A navyše si do bytu vodí nezvyčajne mladé dievča...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Zorba zahrá na Noru, že je do nej zamilovaný, no v skutočnosti jej napichne telefón aj kanceláriu. Klára sa od Eriky dozvie, že Michal je voľný a rozhodne sa využiť to. Vinco poradí Viktorovi, aby sa nevzdával a bojoval o Pauline city.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Parazit: Dalibor a Lenka sú manželmi vyše dvadsať rokov a vychovávajú dve skoro dospelé dcéry - Heňu a Moniku. Heňa sa škole príliš nevenuje, Monika je naopak vzornou žiačkou. O to väčší šok zažijú rodičia, keď zistia, čo Monike je...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Pre lásku božiu: Judita a Noro žijú spokojným životom na vidieku. Noro podniká, Judita sa stará o dve deti a domácnosť. Okrem toho si voľný čas vypĺňa aktivitami pre miestnu kresťanskú komunitu. Všetko by plynulo bez problémov, keby sa jedného dňa neprisťahoval do susedstva podivný muž. Chodí bosý a tvrdí, že má tri manželky...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Bumerang: Manželia Tibor a Erika žijú v pokojnej dedine neďaleko mesta. Majú spoločného syna Andreja a Petra, ktorého má Tibor z prvého manželstva. Obaja chlapci sa zamilujú do dcéry ich nových susedov. A aby toho nebolo málo, Erika zistí šokujúcu vec...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Michal sa Borisa pred Zorbom zastane a nevedomky tým Zorbovi vnukne myšlienku na ďalší krok vo vyšetrovaní. Paula s Viktorom plánujú spoločný rodinný výlet do Viedne, no prekazí im to Jevgenij. Viktorovi zadá úlohu, ktorú nebude môcť odmietnuť.

programme.title: Šaty snov
programme.sub-title: Šaty robia človeka. Nová reality šou
programme.desc: Dnešná epizóda Šiat snov vám prinesie striptéra Matúša, ktorý má problém zmestiť svoje trénované telo do sák štandardnej veľkosti. Nerozhodná folkloristka a budúca nevesta Lenka si nebude vedieť dať rady, ktoré šaty sú vlastne tie vysnené. A mediálna manažérka Evka je perfekcionistka, ktorá má jasnú predstavu – na svadbu nechce nič výstredné, ale zároveň to musí byť sexy. Hovorí sa, že šaty robia človeka. Šaty určujú naše miesto v spoločnosti, ale taktiež hovoria o tom, ako sa v danom momente cítime. V novej reality šou TV Markíza Šaty snov uvidíme ľudí, ktorí si vyberajú svoje ideálne šaty pre najdôležitejšie momenty ich života – čím nemusí byť vždy len svadba. A aj keď sa to často nezaobíde bez prekvapení a nečakaných zvratov, majitelia módnych salónov robia všetko pre to, aby hľadanie skončilo happy endom.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V ďalšej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ populárnu investigatívnu reportérku Kristínu Kövešovú. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Klamár: Magda a Juraj Vančíkovci sú manželia sedem rokov. Nedávno Magda prišla o prácu, no Juraj tvrdil, že sa o ňu dokáže ako spolumajiteľ firmy bez problémov postarať. Napätie medzi nimi začalo rásť po tom, čo Magda zistila, že Juraj predal auto a chce sa firmy zbaviť...

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (5)
programme.desc: Pointy Bits. Elands lock corkscrew horns; storks rattle sabre-shaped beaks; rhinos scare the competition with massive horns; striped marlins spear unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (6)
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers. Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; how dung beetles roll over the competition; wild boars' fierce mating strategies; hyenas' bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School (9)
programme.desc: Second Chances. Difficult quarantine student Taymur has a breakthrough and starts to embrace his jungle school lesson; serial truant Luthy skips class again and gives the staff a run for their money.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year (4)
programme.desc: Winter. Winter in Southern Africa brings drought, ice and storms; the animals that live here must compete with the weather, the land and each other; cheetahs, seals, vultures, and meerkats; rains finally end the dry season and trigger a burst of life.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VII (8)
programme.sub-title: A Wing And A Prayer. Two birds with wing injuries.
programme.desc: A Wing And A Prayer. Two birds with wing injuries.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets II (3)
programme.desc: Waiting for Winter. It's November at Cape Tatnam, and though winter is coming to the lower Western shore of Hudson Bay, the ice, which should be forming by now is nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets (5)
programme.desc: Devon Island: Land of Ice. Devon Island in Nunavut is the largest uninhabited island in the world; the icy landscape is so barren that NASA uses it to simulate conditions on Mars.

programme.title: World's Most Scenic River Journeys (6)
programme.desc: Shannon River. A journey along Ireland's longest river, the Shannon, through an emerald green landscape of rolling hills and sparkling waters; how Vikings, monks and kings have all made their mark.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas IV (5)
programme.sub-title: Fermi Paradox. The Fermi Paradox asks why another civilization has not presented itself.
programme.desc: Fermi Paradox. The Fermi Paradox asks why another civilization has not presented itself.

programme.title: Cosmic Vistas IV (6)
programme.desc: Landsat. Examining Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag, which is designed to reveal complex and ever-changing details undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (4)
programme.desc: Invaders From the Deep. The Asian carp, an invasive species, travels through North American waters, eating, breeding and decimating native fish populations.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild (5)
programme.desc: The Goby Effect. Researchers continue to fight for the survival of the Lake Erie Watersnake, a species on the brink of extinction; a new source of food could mean the snakes have a future after all, so long as the lake's algae blooms cooperate.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VII (9)
programme.desc: Axis Mundi. A group of weasels is ready to be released; a volunteer attempts to rescue an eagle; a gull flies free.

programme.title: World's Most Scenic River Journeys (6)
programme.desc: Shannon River. A journey along Ireland's longest river, the Shannon, through an emerald green landscape of rolling hills and sparkling waters; how Vikings, monks and kings have all made their mark.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island (5)
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty. In the Berenty Reserve, the troops rushed to make use of the short food bounty that followed early rains but then the dry heat returned; with their pups getting larger there's more pressure to find food.

programme.title: Gorillas of Gabon
programme.desc: Trackers search for Mussiru, a 400-pound silverback gorilla, in Gabon; their mission is to habituate him to humans because the future of his bloodline and the rainforest he inhabits depend on it.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk (1)
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World. The sun rises on a day in May and the animals of the American tropics get ready to beat the heat.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island (5)
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty. In the Berenty Reserve, the troops rushed to make use of the short food bounty that followed early rains but then the dry heat returned; with their pups getting larger there's more pressure to find food.

programme.title: Gorillas of Gabon
programme.desc: Trackers search for Mussiru, a 400-pound silverback gorilla, in Gabon; their mission is to habituate him to humans because the future of his bloodline and the rainforest he inhabits depend on it.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue II (3)
programme.desc: The team release rehabilitated pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys; Dr. Charlotte searches for a missing bird of prey; Dr. Amanda helps a bush pig savaged by poachers' dogs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (5)
programme.desc: Pointy Bits. Elands lock corkscrew horns; storks rattle sabre-shaped beaks; rhinos scare the competition with massive horns; striped marlins spear unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas II (6)
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers. Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; how dung beetles roll over the competition; wild boars' fierce mating strategies; hyenas' bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Shadowlands (1)
programme.desc: Bound by Blood. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions; the sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands (2)
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water. New Zealand's dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep; as winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Shadowlands (3)
programme.desc: Age of Independence. The south-eastern coast of New Zealand is the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults; young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (2)
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula; Muaupo. Setting sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals; watching as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Too Young. When Alice and Lewis go to the Valley of the Night to look for MooMoo wool, they run into Queen and Charlie. When the little prince asks if he can go with the girl and her rabbit friend, the Queen begrudgingly agrees, and orders the two friends to take good care of her nephew. Charlie is ecstatic to be able to go on a “big boy’s adventure!” But is brought down to Earth with a bang when he finds out his aunt has been following them on the quiet. Feeling betrayed, he decides to run away.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Frost Ball. The King of Frostaland invites the Queen to a “frost ball” in his realm. Eager to look good, the Wonderland monarch appoints Lewis to open the ball, and threatens to remove him as clockmaster should he mess up! The poor rabbit must now set about learning the art of “tea-skating,” a kind of ice-skating on teapots! Only problem is, he’s scared of taking the plunge and decides to listen to Dodson’s advice (the dodo’s taken on the role of self-appointed coach) instead of simply trying it out himself. Needless to say, Dodson exploits the situation to get extra special treatment. So Alice steps in, determined to do whatever it takes to bring Lewis to his senses.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Surprise!
programme.desc: Surprise!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Saving Mooncake. When Ella borrows Slippy’s luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. It’s only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: A Star is born. It’s Ella’s mom’s birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, she’ll have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Oddity. When a prized possession goes missing, Slippy’s sure the mysterious Alien Silicon Jellyfish took it! Ella’s pretty sure the Jellyfish doesn’t exist... but as the gang hunts for it, Ella learns that supporting her friend is what matters most!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Runaway Rover. On the eve of Dad opening his museum of human artifacts on the moon, Ella and Slippy help him by “fixing” a lunar rover until it drives off, with Glitch on board! Determined to fix this themselves, our gang understands it’s best to admit your mistake and ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Looneyburg Lights
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Magic Mirror. Hildie and Beatie bring home a fortune telling magic mirror. When it shows Tom a future he doesn't like he tries everything to avoid it. In fact everything that Tom does seems to avoid his future seems to make it worse. No amount of magic can change Tom's luck.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Bone Dry. Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones. The detectives investigate a community garden and it seems like their number one suspect is an elusive gopher. It turns out that Tyke dug up all of his dad's bones and was saving them as a birthday present for Spike.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Sleeping King. When the Queen reluctantly takes Charlie to Frostaland so he can take part in the traditional “Cherry-Choc Harvest,” she finds the King fast asleep, due to a blunder committed by Alice. But instead of helping Alice and Lewis find an antidote to break the magic spell he’s under, the monarch throws every monkey wrench she can possibly get her hands on into the works! Truth is: she’s jealous of Charlie’s affection for the King of Frostaland.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Lewis' Shadow. Lewis’ shadow becomes detached when Alice accidentally shuts the door behind her rabbit friend a little too fast! Alice finds it super funny. Lewis, on the other hand, is freaking out: his shadow’s a bit too facetious for his liking, not to mention the fact that Queen has a rule against shadows coming off! Unfortunately, the shadow has a mind of its own and the monarch soon finds out. When Alice and Lewis get grounded because of it, the rabbit blames his shadow. But when the latter comes to their rescue, he realizes he misjudged it. In fact, he actually grows pretty fond of it in the end!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Palladium Quest. When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But it’s a metal so rare it’s only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Friendship Supernova. Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Mynah. Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: When You Leash Expect It. Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, they're on their way, much to Tom's chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Don't Cut the Cheese. It's that special time of year when the Lady of the House's rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. It's up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Calamari Jerry. Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cattyshack. It's time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, he's determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Saving Mooncake. When Ella borrows Slippy’s luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. It’s only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: A Star is born. It’s Ella’s mom’s birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, she’ll have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rules of Attraction. It's Valentine's Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentine's present – a love magnet! However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and "acts" of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Brain Power of Love. The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrow's brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelmina's clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover. Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that she's been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Lion Catches a Bug. When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion – the King of the Forest – to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lion's ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lion's ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tik Tok and Tin Man. Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking he's a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Tok's voice mechanism isn't working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Man's jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn. Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the center. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk – but at the price of his smarts. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozma's maze, Scarecrow must get back his smarts to save the day.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Heel! What a disaster!: the Queen’s favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis don’t find them, they’re going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majesty’s possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queen’s feet!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Hypnotised. Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Car Wash. Mr Bean's car is filthy so he gives it a good wash. His sparklingly clean car attracts the attention of other drivers who offer to pay Mr Bean to wash their cars too. Bean cannot resist and builds a car-washing contraption to help him out. But when a certain very posh visitor’s car gets damaged Bean thinks he’s for the chop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Where Did You... Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks
programme.desc: Thomas and the Troublesome Trucks

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Big Little Problems. How can one little golf ball cause a crater the size of a house? By hurtling through space - that’s how! One little rock can cause a chain reaction by hitting bigger and bigger pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Big Break. After hurting her leg, Ella has to take it easy for an entire day. Does she have the patience to sit and rest for that long? When she runs out of activities at home, Ella’s dad offers to take her along on one of his towing operations

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Glitch's Big Day. When Glitch’s arm shorts out, Ella’s dad has the right tools to fix him. While he’s at it, Dad shows off his latest creation, a Super Towing Arm. Slippy is impressed and Glitch is more than happy to try it on for size

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Pet Sitter. Ella is enlisted to pet sit Buttons, a friend’s dog, on the very day she has to finish a school project about Venus. She decides to take on both responsibilities at once by taking Buttons with her to the planet to capture the final piece of video footage she needs. When the thunder from the storms around Venus scare Buttons into accidentally detaching himself from his pod, he lands on the pla net and disappears. Ella and her friends search frantically on the hot planet but cannot find him. It’s Buttons who finds Ella! Ella admits she shouldn’t have taken her furry friend with her, but at least she learned new facts for her project!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Just Plane Nuts. Rick and Ginger are going on a vacation and bringing Tom and Spike aboard the plane. Stowaways Jerry and Tuffy are also along for the ride and things go awry when all the pets start chasing each other on the plane. Rick and Ginger are oblivious that their pets are annoying the entire plane.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pets Not Welcome. When Rick and Ginger sneak Tom and Spike into a hotel where pets are not allowed they make the pets promise they won't leave the hotel room! Too bad Jerry and Tuffy want to explore and have fun. The pets run rampant through the hotel while being chased by the hotel manager. They manage to trash the hotel and get kicked out of their paradise vacation.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'. Rick and Ginger take Tom and Butch on a cruise ship. Jerry and Tuffy leave to explore the ship's buffet and leave Spike and Tom in the room. They all meet Meathead a vicious ship cat who will stop at nothing to terrorize the four of them. They all band together to defeat Meathead but not before they wreak havoc on the ship.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Road Trippin'. Rick and Ginger take Tom and Spike on a road trip to Ginger's aunt's house. Spike is terrorized by a dog traveling in a trailer. Tom and Spike get left behind at a pit stop and must travel with the Hannibal the mean trailer dog. They must escape and find their way back to Rick and Ginger. Jerry and Tuffy cause problems when they get caught in Rick and Ginger's suitcase.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Confetti Car Kerfuffle
programme.desc: Confetti Car Kerfuffle

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Shopping. Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Too Young. When Alice and Lewis go to the Valley of the Night to look for MooMoo wool, they run into Queen and Charlie. When the little prince asks if he can go with the girl and her rabbit friend, the Queen begrudgingly agrees, and orders the two friends to take good care of her nephew. Charlie is ecstatic to be able to go on a “big boy’s adventure!” But is brought down to Earth with a bang when he finds out his aunt has been following them on the quiet. Feeling betrayed, he decides to run away.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Frost Ball. The King of Frostaland invites the Queen to a “frost ball” in his realm. Eager to look good, the Wonderland monarch appoints Lewis to open the ball, and threatens to remove him as clockmaster should he mess up! The poor rabbit must now set about learning the art of “tea-skating,” a kind of ice-skating on teapots! Only problem is, he’s scared of taking the plunge and decides to listen to Dodson’s advice (the dodo’s taken on the role of self-appointed coach) instead of simply trying it out himself. Needless to say, Dodson exploits the situation to get extra special treatment. So Alice steps in, determined to do whatever it takes to bring Lewis to his senses.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Novel Idea. An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - it's a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Tom's discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat Match Fever. Butch is bobbing for apple cores when he spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Butch slicks back his hair with some lard and strikes a pose. But she walks right past the alley cat. Meanwhile, inside the house, Tom spots Toodles headed in his direction. After a quick spruce up, Tom opens the door only to watch her walk right past the house. Tom slumps. Turns out Toodles is headed to Winston's house. Yep, who knew the two were a match made in kitty heaven (or at least that's what the catmatch app said). Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Fish Out of Water. Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol' Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom can't pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry who's trying to protect him!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Official Ozian Exam. The Mayor tells Dorothy she must pass the Official Oziam Exam in order to stay in Oz. Scarecrow (MICHAEL GOUGH) tries to tutor her, but an emergency in Munchkinland takes her attention off the books and onto an adventure. She has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Is Dorothy is able to help and have time to study? How will she pass the test?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Locket Locket in My Pocket. The Munchkins are throwing a down-home, country fair in honor of Dorothy. While Dorothy enjoys the pleasures of the fair, Wilhelmina finds a magical locket that allows her to look exactly like whoever's picture she keeps in it (except for a green streak in her hair). Wilhelmina uses it to take the form of Dorothy and crash the fair. With the wicked Dorothy impersonator running about the fair, the Munchkins are appalled that Princess Dorothy is acting so greedy, grabby and ungrateful! The real Princess Dorothy must figure out what's going on and clear her name before the citizens of Oz revoke her Princess-ship.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer. Ozma wants to whip up a snack but has never baked before. Dorothy shows her how to make cookies. But Dorothy accidentally grabs the Potion of Life instead of the vanilla and pours it into the mixing bowl! The hand-mixer spins to life, magically mixing things together as it whizzes around the room. Oh my! The mixer spins out of the palace, mixing everything in its path! Realizing the only way to reverse the mix-up is to reverse the spell, Dorothy and Ozma must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo the Unlucky. Dorothy and the gang need to take a munchkin Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse! As soon as they start their journey, they find out how Ojo the Unlucky earned his name – when they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen! From having to cross the Deadly Desert to getting attacked by Orks, it's bad luck at every turn. When the Nome King catches them, he's determined to lock them up to keep the bad luck out of his kingdom. But Dorothy reframes their day, realizing it was actually Ojo's good luck that got them out of every obstacle.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike Flu. Poor Mike is bedridden. He's been struck down by a nasty cold so Iris and the turtles are forced take care of his every need, including trying to repel the raccoons from the house. Fighting raccoons isn't their specialty and Iris and the turtles quickly end up locked in the garage. Mike is forced to intervene but he's so sick and weak that he's a pushover. How can he overcome the raccoons this time? Mike's problem could be the very solution he needs to defeat the tenacious raccoons.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rise of the Nome King. After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once he's big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally. Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey who's run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozma's help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they don't seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wand-erful. There's a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glinda's protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witch's wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glinda's steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, it's up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else it's curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.
